channel.title: Shop prices don't come out what I set them
channel.description:
Like I set the value for:
[code]item = 4151 Abyssal_whip A_weapon_from_the_abyss. 2000000.00 2000000.00 2000000.00 0 82 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 100 0[/code]
For 2mil but when I click value it shows up as: 2,537,500
Should I be setting these a bit diffrently?

item.title: Shop prices don't come out what I set them
item.dc:creator: @For For ( ; ; )
item.description:
@For wrote:

[quote=“Java Is My Bitch™, post:4, topic:167417”]Because in client.java there is a shop price, the money you set it at will be multiplied by that, thus giving the shop price, mines is set at 1, so it will be whatever i put it to be, but i don’t remember where it’s located so you got to find it yourself.

Actually wait i found it:

Search this in client.java:

TotPrice = (ShopValue * 1.26875)

Change the decimal to a whole number, meaning 1.[/quote]

If it will just come out to equal the shop price ( since anything multiplied by 1 is itself ) why not just make it …

TotPrice = ShopValue;

Or just use ShopValue instead of TotPrice.

Read full topic
item.source: Shop prices don't come out what I set them

item.title: Shop prices don't come out what I set them
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

[quote=“elitescouter, post:5, topic:167417”][quote author=Java Is My Bitch link=topic=226822.msg1950583#msg1950583 date=1198494138]
Because in client.java there is a shop price, the money you set it at will be multiplied by that, thus giving the shop price, mines is set at 1, so it will be whatever i put it to be, but i don’t remember where it’s located so you got to find it yourself.

Actually wait i found it:

Search this in client.java:

TotPrice = (ShopValue * 1.26875)

Change the decimal to a whole number, meaning 1.
[/quote]

Thanks!!![/quote]

No problem.

Read full topic
item.source: Shop prices don't come out what I set them

item.title: Shop prices don't come out what I set them
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Because in client.java there is a shop price, the money you set it at will be multiplied by that, thus giving the shop price, mines is set at 1, so it will be whatever i put it to be, but i don’t remember where it’s located so you got to find it yourself.

Actually wait i found it:

Search this in client.java:

TotPrice = (ShopValue * 1.26875)

Change the decimal to a whole number, meaning 1.

into 6000000.00
